# f5distributedcloud_segment (Resource)

Manages an F5 Distributed Cloud Segment. Segments provide network isolation and segmentation.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the Segment.
- `namespace` (String) Namespace where the Segment is created.

### Optional

- `description` (String) Description of the Segment.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Unique identifier for the Segment.
